definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: When the steel was placed in ice water and hit with a hammer, it shattered.
sentences.chinese: 当钢铁被安放在冰水中并用锤子敲打时，它碎掉了。

sentences.english: Ice water play a negative role on gastric function, but drinking warm water can help the body absorb it.
sentences.chinese: 冰水对胃脏功能不利，喝暖开水则有助于身体吸收。

sentences.english: How about a cup of ice water?

sentences.chinese: 冰水使克莉丝苏醒过来。

sentences.english: It has stainless steel temperature- holder box , it is very convince to purify.
sentences.chinese: 水式冰水机备有不锈钢保温水箱，清洗方便。

sentences.english: Has that snow and ice to melt, turns into trickle the rill, the ice water is moistening the land.
sentences.chinese: 更有那冰雪融化，化成涓涓小溪，冰水滋润着土地。

sentences.english: The ice-water here is safe to drink. What would you like to order, madam?
sentences.chinese: 这里的冰水饮用是安全的，夫人，您想订些什么？

sentences.english: Add enough iced water to mix it to a dough.
sentences.chinese: 加入适量冰水，混合成一个面团。

sentences.english: For example, this one has an icemaker and water and ice dispensers built into the door.
sentences.chinese: 比如这台冰箱有一个制冰机，门上还有冰水分送器。

sentences.english: Put your hands in ice water and flex them if you have a migraine.
sentences.chinese: 如果你偏头疼，就把手放进冰水里，并弯曲手指。

sentences.english: A pitcher of ice water sweat on a hot day.
sentences.chinese: 盛著冰水的水罐表面在热天会结水珠。

sentences.english: The designs of chillerradiatorunique , so the heat exchange efficiency is very high.
sentences.chinese: 冰水机冷凝器及散热器设计独特，换热效果特佳。

sentences.english: Rinse lettuce well and tear into small pieces with hands, then soak in ice water for some time.
sentences.chinese: 生菜洗净，撕小片后浸入冰水，取出沥干待用。

sentences.english: Restaurants are even banned from serving customers iced water unless they specifically ask for it.
sentences.chinese: 餐馆甚至除了在客人特地要求时禁止提供冰水。

sentences.english: A refreshing highball for those who like grapefruit juice.
sentences.chinese: 为那些喜欢葡萄柚汁准备的清新冰水威士忌。

sentences.english: Most unfortunately, the whole pitcher of ice cold water was dumped directly into George's lap.
sentences.chinese: 最倒霉的是，整瓶冰水都直接洒在了乔治的大腿上。
